metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40791 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
extract_user_to_sg in lib/scatterlist.c in the Linux kernel before 6.4.12fails to unpin pages in a certain situation, as demonstrated by a WARNINGfor try_grab_page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40791` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-5-generic - 6.5.0-5.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-generic - 6.5.0-5.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-generic-64k - 6.5.0-5.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-lowlatency - 6.5.0-5.5.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-5.5.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-starfive - 6.5.0-1002.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-5.5').
linux-aws package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1003.3').

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-5.5.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1003.3').
linux-raspi package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1004.5').
